website_summaries.verdict: A powerful, affordable tool designed with ease of use in mind.

customer_reviews.title: Best tool I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best tool I've ever purchased. Bought this a little over 2 years ago and used it for many small/medium sized projects. I instantly fell in love. I've never owned an impact driver before, and wow, was I missing out! I recently build a 22' x 48' barn for my chickens. Everything was screwed together. I estimated I must have used over 4,000 screws, and this drill worked flawlessly. When/if this thing ever quits working, I'm buying another.
customer_reviews.author: W C Genzer

customer_reviews.title: Packs a Punch
customer_reviews.text: This impact driver is my first Porter Cable with the lithium ion batteries. All of my older tools are NiCad. Man does this thing work great! I've used it on the motorcycles, automobiles, mowers and lots of other equipment. The battery lasts much longer and charges much faster. Can't wait to convert my older tools to the newer lithium batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Orsini

customer_reviews.title: because I like my other P-C 20V tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, my first impact driver, because I like my other P-C 20V tools. Lots of torque and long-lived batteries. I'm not disappointed at all, except it's hard to get used to the multi-stage trigger. This driver performs best with the Torx drive deck screws rather than older Philips-head screws. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first impact hammer, I wasn't even sure exactly what one does. This turned out to be a good buy, it's really fast, has a lot of torque and is a pretty good deal. Comes with a hard case 2 batteries and a charger. It's small and compact has a cool guide led lioght that comes on when you slightly press on the trigger. I would not use something like this to put Ikea furniture together, but for projects like installing a flagpole outside your house for drilling in rock or concrete or 2x4 wood and stuff. Does hold the charge for a long time and has a cool battery level indicator on the device itself.
customer_reviews.author: radiskull666

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for work as a boat builder along with drill used now for three weeks no problems works vary well, lots of driving power trigger control for smaller fasteners a must.I Like the light, belt loop, magnetic bit holder, and battary condition indicator. The whole driver was well thought out and light weight and balanced with the long lasting, fast charging lithium ion battary. I recomend a second battary for limited down time betwen changes. I hope this lasts a long time to come worth the money and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great value for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical at first, Porter Cable isn't exactly known for world class quality but I purchased 3 of these for the guys at my shop and they beat the heck out of these drills for 8 hours a day. So far a few months down the road can't complain, still holding up, battery holds a charge and you're not going to find that amount of battery power and torque for the price anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: pgsnewyork

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: For a 1/4 drive electric tool I didn’t expect the power I got from this bad boy. Use it daily for work on cars, under the hood, behind the dash.... doesn’t matter this thing has enough torque to break solid bolts loose but isn’t so overpowered it snaps the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool is amazing. It's super lightweight and powerful. I didn't realize it came with a bag, so it made the purchase even better. I am able to store the driver, both batteries and charger in the bag. I was also surprised to see the battery level indicator on the drill. I am very impressed and now am finding any excuse to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went to use this it was already broken? It smelled hot at the first touch of the trigger; went to use it anyway and it just doesn't work. the motor whirs away, but it won't crank anything, literally. Not even just the socket attached. Unless I'm missing something somewhere, if anyone has any ideas, please share.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Strong and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I love the strength and feel of this tool. The 2amp battery is good for that class but runs dead in 20 to 30 min of use. Charger is cheap but works. I ordered a replacement cause I over used it. Worked with my rapid charger from another Porter Cable kit.
customer_reviews.author: KingpinKamel

customer_reviews.title: chuck wobble
customer_reviews.text: The chuck wobbled terribly causing screws to strip and drill bits to grab the sides of thin metal and twist it up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lasky

customer_reviews.title: Great value cordless drill!!
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? It was a great price, was shipped promptly and came exactly as described. I would buy this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Boy

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star
customer_reviews.text: This gun is better than I expected. I have not tried it with any 1/2 drive sockets yet, but i can tell you that with 1/4 in and 1/2 in i have had NO problems, I can;t rate other companies for i do not have or ever used any others, but i can rate this because it does what is expected. Yes i woudl recommend it to anyone who wants to do away for the most part with Ratchets.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Great but one word of caution for new users
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to impact drivers and I must say I'm very impressed by what this device can do in comparison to my trusty cordless drill. I would offer one word of caution to first time users - as i learned the hard way- this tool will snap the heads off regular screws in a instant. Use it only with heavy duty hardware rated for this kind of torque.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Ok but I should have bought Bosch
customer_reviews.text: This works well and has not failed. I am not sure how long this will last though given some of the noises it makes now after simple uses over the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Witness#2018

customer_reviews.title: Strong but not a very good speed control
customer_reviews.text: This is a very impressive little unit. I use it for auto mechanic type work. It's VERY high torque and can strip or break a bolt in a flash! The trigger is not very linear and there is NO creep speed. You have to get used to how much trigger you apply.
customer_reviews.author: GVK

customer_reviews.title: Mama Mia!!! What power!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to repair bad construction by our builder. This bad boy put lags into the 2x4's like a hot knife in butter. What a great tool. Just be sure to remember, that it's a 1/4" tool and you'll need to get adaptors for your sockets. Mama Mia!!! Atsa some spicy meatball!! (youngsters will need to look that up!)
customer_reviews.author: TRONICS-INSTRUCTOR

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The unit is very compact but still has lots of power. The battery lasts quite awhile along with quick charging. The quick chuck is also great. I had a contractor come to my house to do some work and caught him using it....he said it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Best driver out there for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day in my automotive business and it is a nice change from dragging air hoses around. Strong enough to remove most bolts( tip use shorter bits for max torque)
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Two rechargable batteries, extra plus
customer_reviews.text: Nothing worse than a drill that runs out of juice. Have no fear with this impact drill. With two batteries included in the price it can't be beat. Have used it for almost a month and so far no complaints. Does everything as advertised and with the quick recharging time haven't had any problem completing projects with the two batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power, with rapid charger. I just ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power ,with rapid charger .I just built a deck ,this drill met all my expectations and more while drilling 3 1/2 in. screws .Battery does wear down after about 50 screws ,so have your extra battery charged
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Good drill but charger no good. I had to replace after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: robert pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Been a very good drill. Can you believe it has gone up ...
customer_reviews.text: Been a very good drill. Can you believe it has gone up in price by 50% since I bought in Dec 2015
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great tool. Now I need to buy a matching ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this now for more than a year on a bunch of projects. Having a powerful impact driver makes installing even 4" screws a breeze. It's a great tool. Now I need to buy a matching drill.
customer_reviews.author: Joe DTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice powerful impact, using for over a month now installing garage doors daily, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Mattymatic87

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't care is you will use this once a month.. it's worth the price and it's functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to remove lug nuts on my Ranger. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove lug nuts on my Ranger. Took longer than I thought it would. Had to use a breaker bar to loosen some lug nuts before finishing removal with the Porter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: The two batteries are great, and he uses it at work all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Dad, and he loves it. The two batteries are great, and he uses it at work all the time. It is more durable than other brands, and works better than the black and Decker one he had.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary T. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan of these Porter Cable tools. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of these Porter Cable tools. They are just not professional grade. They do not last and do not have "stuff" of other brands. Replaced with Hitachi.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Originally planned on a dewalt, but couldn't come to grips with the price. So far the PC runs and performs great. The light is much more effective then I thought it would be, and the unit has plenty of power. The only thing left is the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: RussM

customer_reviews.title: Love this driver
customer_reviews.text: This is my first impact driver and I love it. It makes driving screws so much easier. I just finished hanging a few sheets of Durock and this thing made life so much simpler. I also love that it comes with a good, solid case. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: David Ishmael

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed as of yet
customer_reviews.text: Good brand name but it has been sparking internally since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P.

customer_reviews.title: Make and Impact
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Just keep the bit in the bolt or screw slot and this will imbed it with the slightest of pressure. Batteries charge quickly. One is charging with the other is in use. It's light weight too. That's appreciated when working over your head. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: enchanted walker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ALMOST TOO POWERFUL - CAN TEAR UP A SCREW HEAD VERY QUICKLY, IF YOU'RE NOT CAREFUL!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth W.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, now I want one.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my brother-in-law, he loves it. I got to use it and have to say it is well balanced, charges real fast, and drives screws home in a hurry. I have many other drills, including impact drivers, but this would be my choice for a well-built daily drill driver. Used drill to build a metal greenhouse and it drove self-tapping bolts all afternoon on a single charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it so far
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it so far. Has been making a big difference in the play-scape I am putting together for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: lmbr25

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Arrived as stated in the desription. Low cost item and worked OK for the price. Power cuts out under heavier load, though works great for light around the house duties. Definitley not a mechanics shop tool.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Liming

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite tools now
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite tools now. First time I have ever had an impact driver, and not sure why it has taken me this long. Battery recharging is extremely quick! Great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Neff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is very handy having the two batteries plus charger. Never have to stop working
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I work with tools and sell tools every day, so I consider myself pretty knowledgeable in this field. When you consider price, quality, product features and ergonomic, I feel this is the best impact driver I have used. Time will tell how the tool rates regarding durability. At that point my star rating may move up or down.
customer_reviews.author: JRWcharleston

customer_reviews.title: good tool but hard to get parts for it.
customer_reviews.text: lot of torque. gets the job done. about 5 months of use the washer from the bit holder came out and i cannot just order the parts from the porter cable website i have to send it to an approved repair shop. not really liking that much.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Great item for Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I wonder why I haven't had an impact sooner! Come out of the stone age and purchase this item!
customer_reviews.author: JPCLAW

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: I've used and owned many different screw guns. This one is great for the price. I mainly use this one around the house and smaller applications. I also have a brushless Dewalt for more commercial applications. This driver can handle a good beating!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. The other day I spent two hours drilling out a bolt after I stripped the head. Never again. The driver did short work on the others. Highly recommend it. You need the 20 v of power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seemed a bit pricey but did a great job driving 6" lag bolts in a header beam
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a bit pricey but did a great job driving 6" lag bolts in a header beam. I tend to be a DeWalt kinda guy but I have a set of 20 volt PC power tools and they do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: swtrader

customer_reviews.title: Handy and plenty of power
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I am not a pro nor use it to make a living, but I like to take on projects and this works very well for running just about any screws you want to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Mike C in East TX

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: Great driver have used a great deal, may upgrade to a dewlat 20 volt set when price comes down, but no complaints from this unit so far. Very powerful compared to a reguar drill for driving screws
customer_reviews.author: dlupchurch21

customer_reviews.title: My guys asked me to buy a porter-cable and they love it!
customer_reviews.text: I own my own garage door company and we install all our products using cordless impacts We have always used makita's. My guys asked me to buy a porter-cable and they love it!! So if you are in the market for a cordless impact this is the one to buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Brooks II

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! ;Drives screws and lag bolts into hardwoods very easily. Couldn't be happier with it's performance!
customer_reviews.author: RogerP

customer_reviews.title: Well made and very durable. Dropped it by accident ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very durable. Dropped it by accident off a 20 foot ladder on concrete and still works. Battery lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: Trucker

customer_reviews.title: great product plenty of power for it's size
customer_reviews.text: great product plenty of power for it's size, seems to shut down when hot think it is a safety feature
customer_reviews.author: Richard Berens

customer_reviews.title: Works absolutely great
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought this after giving up on removing a stuck screw. I tried freezing the screw, using WD40 and just plain arm strength. This driver took the screw out in 2 seconds. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Melvin Soriano

customer_reviews.title: Do it over again
customer_reviews.text: Bought one six years ago, finally broke it putting in 8 inch screws in fence post. Has been a hard working tool, so bought another one.
customer_reviews.author: S G

customer_reviews.title: one tough Impact Driver
customer_reviews.text: This little driver has the power to drill 7/8" holes through studs for a good hour before you need to swap battery. These studs were in a old house so they were extremely hard wood. The price was very good, I will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ron S

customer_reviews.title: Can't Say Enough Good Things About This Driver
customer_reviews.text: Great, hard working, reliable, tough. We have two of these. They get dropped, lost in a pile of sawdust, found, stepped on, used hard all day on wood of every kind. And they keep on performing beautifully. Our impact drivers are probably more abused than any other tool we have. Husband uses his in his 2400 square foot cabinet shop, I use mine on renovation here in the house. Note to women: Impact drivers are fabulous if you have arthritic hands because all you have to do is push a little--the driver does the rest!
customer_reviews.author: MizJones

customer_reviews.title: Great driver, cheaper elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Driver is great, have used it for putting screws in the walls and backing some stubborn ones out. I would advise checking at the blue big box hardware store for a cheaper price though.
customer_reviews.author: R. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Awsome little tool, this thing is tough and strong. Batteries hold charge really well, very good for what ever project.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus a camunez

customer_reviews.title: Makes me feel like a furniture assembling
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! Makes me feel like a furniture assembling, home improving champ.
customer_reviews.author: JitWit

customer_reviews.title: great tool
customer_reviews.text: very powerful and the battery last. the magnets fro the bits needs to be improved because the bits fall off with the vibration. but it a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Justask

customer_reviews.title: Great Drill for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Porter Cable tool. I will say i'm very impressed by the initial quality. I've only had the change to use it once but was very impressed with its torque. I'm not sure what people are talking about when they say it's heavy...this thing is lighter then any other drill or impact driver i've ever owned. The light does stay on when you press the trigger slightly which gives plenty of light for viewing your work area in the dark. I purchased this for automotive work. I'll circle back and re-review once I get some time behind the trigger. Only con I have is it is slightly louder then my previous impact driver.
customer_reviews.author: efrost

customer_reviews.title: Great Tool
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, powerful, and long battery life. The only negative I have is the manual says if you use the variable speed, less than full on, it may possibly damage the drill.
customer_reviews.author: cwd

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this tool many times and has been very pleased with its quality and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Well pleased

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: another great tool from portercable. light and plenty of power
customer_reviews.author: R. Provost

customer_reviews.title: POWWWWEEEEEEERRRR
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and nice fit and finish, would defintely buy one again. The only downside is that there are currently no other 20V tools from Porter Cable (as of 5/22/13).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Raw Power
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds all my expectations. Drives screws in the toughest materials with no effort. couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great impact
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for over two years now with no problems great power and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love it the batteries took a few runs to get to max run time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quality battery
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful and good battery life, quick recharge, good alternative to Makita and Dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Stanley C. Hui

customer_reviews.title: 20 volt Porter-Cable is a real powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is compact and extremely powerful. Lots of torque to bust loose or drive the longest of screws! My only suggestion is that it could use a bit holder.
customer_reviews.author: jackson

customer_reviews.title: great tool. Should have bought one a long time ...
customer_reviews.text: great tool. Should have bought one a long time ago for my garage. It is a real time saver. I have 2 of them now
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Boles

customer_reviews.title: very good tool
customer_reviews.text: great tool good power makes little jobs around house, very easy. duel batterys make for long usability I love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful tool.
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Very good power and compact size. Will drive 4" screws in Pine with no problem. Fantastic tool and time saver.
customer_reviews.author: papasmurfboyd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Driver!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best impact driver i have owned. Have built half a home using this for all the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Porter Cable impact screwdriver.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a serious impact gun. this is it. This thing has lots of torque and when compared to the yellow impact gun everybody else uses here mine is so much better and much more powerful. the only negative thing is it has only 1 LED light but thats not a reason not to buy it. If you have serious work to do get this tool. If you just fiddle around but something cheaper . This is a MANS TOOL.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: great tool and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicks ass. I've seen the lead tech for my shop use his with a 1/2" drive chuck to remove 3/4" - 1" bolts on diesel trailer shocks. I don't use mine for that, but I bought one after using the one belonging the the lead tech. I love this tool and use it for so many things. Battery-life is good, the batteries charge fast and this is a great price for a driver, charger, and two batteries. It also has a button you can press to check the battery life; great feature if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Thane House

customer_reviews.title: Porter-Cable PCCK640LB 20-Volt Impact Driver
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is unbelievably powerful! Don't know how I lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tool!
customer_reviews.text: Have a small motorcycle dealership and this drill is my best friend. Recommend a long Phillips screwdriver attachment and some socket bits. LOVE this drill
customer_reviews.author: frankformfactor

customer_reviews.title: They love this impact driver
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my husband and one for my daughter. They love this impact driver.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Powerful
customer_reviews.text: The Parter Cable impacts are very good quality, and they perform well and the battery life is very good.I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: EastTnMan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Drove 3
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Drove 3.5" x 1/2" lag bolts with no problem. Light and no torque on the wrist. Battery life seems ok. I'm just a home dyi guy, so not sure how this holds up for the pros.
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he loves the power of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: One of the best impact drills I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: One of the best impact drills I have ever used. Great level of power that can hold a charge too.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Had some rusty bolts on my car that didn't stand a chance one this baby got a hold of them. Love this driver. Be carefull it will destroy your normal sockets and accessories you must use impact rated accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Superman1360

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome impact driver. My co workers want to use mine because the torque on this is amazing. I would recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Sade Phillips

customer_reviews.title: very happy and would recommend it to any one looking for ...
customer_reviews.text: powerful little unit, it has done every job I put up against with ease, so far. very happy and would recommend it to any one looking for a impact driver.
customer_reviews.author: douglas r koch

customer_reviews.title: nice equipment
customer_reviews.text: Im an RV technician and works for many things i do from screws to nuts and bolts. Plenty of power when you need it
customer_reviews.author: R Weber

customer_reviews.title: Super powerful
customer_reviews.text: so much power and great size batteries last a long time and charge fast can drive anything we give to it
customer_reviews.author: JasonS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the driver...cant believe I've been driving in screws with a drill this long.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good tool. Great price. Just wish the light stayed on a little longer
customer_reviews.author: Corey Totaro

customer_reviews.title: was a gift but recipient loved it and used it to put up a tunnel ...
customer_reviews.text: was a gift but recipient loved it and used it to put up a tunnel Greenhouse and repairs that needed this type tool...
customer_reviews.author: Lucille  P.  Smith

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This driver is in its own class lots of torque. long battery life and a light to help see. This is a must for any builder
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Ingraham

customer_reviews.title: COMES PACKED WITH AWESOME SAUCE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this sent to my work (auto shop-but I am not a tech) and we used it on some cars and then the manager used it to build shelves in his office -SAME DAY! SAME CHARGE!! This bad boy was hangin' with the PROFESSIONAL SNAP-ON stuff costing almost 3x as much! This would be in TIM TAYLOR'S tool box!!
customer_reviews.author: robert      chandler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: In need of a very dependable tool. Found it in this tool. Just the torque needed for the price. Would recommend to the home tech or heavy shop user.
customer_reviews.author: Maxice

customer_reviews.title: like it so much I had to replace it
customer_reviews.text: Had this item before, but it got broken, like it so much I had to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: keith phillips

customer_reviews.title: Awesome impact driver
customer_reviews.text: Awesome impact driver. I'm very pleased with it. Payed for itself in just a couple of days. I just ordered the drill to go along with it, I am that happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam LaCrone

customer_reviews.title: What an Impact!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the $$ This impact drill will get any large or small job done with ease. It's light and comes with two batteries that charge in less then 15 min!!
customer_reviews.author: CDZ 1066

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, almost too powerful
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for this little imapact, it's strong. A little squeeze of the trigger will send a screw deep(too deep if not careful.) I bought this impact to go with the rest of the PC 20v set I already had. It does not disappoint. For the price, it can't be beat. Comes with case, clip, charger, two batteries, impact driver, and bit. Great value. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Watchguy

customer_reviews.title: You need to get this impact
customer_reviews.text: This was my first impact driver and was blown away by how powerful yet lightweight it is. I am currently redoing my first floor of my house and had to put up new beams and this little guy drove in 3" screws like it was going into hot butter. I also used it for putting down the subfloor and could drive in 100's of screws before I needed to change batteries. It came to me looking like it was brand new. Love this tool.
customer_reviews.author: 7tstang

customer_reviews.title: This thing failed after 3 months of use on automotive ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing failed after 3 months of use on automotive applications, motor burnt up and started smoking. Only a 30 day refund/exchange policy??? The Ryobi I had prior lasted 4 years, thought I was upgrading by going to a Porter Cable, I was clearly mistaken. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rockhold

customer_reviews.title: Awsome !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has surpassed my expectations, I work on cars, and this impact is so powerful... I love it, and I use it everyday..
customer_reviews.author: bgoodman777

product_meta.title: PORTER-CABLE 20V MAX Cordless Impact Driver Kit, 1/4-Inch, Tool Only (PCCK640LB)
product_meta.description:
The Porter-Cable PCCK640LB 20V 1/4-Inch Hex Lithium Ion Impact Driver Kit features an impact driver with a high torque motor. The 20V Max Lithium Ion batteries with 1.5-Amp cells deliver more power and runtime in a smaller package. An easy load chuck allows user to insert bit with one hand and the LED Work light provides additional light in dark work areas. As a compact tool (6.2-Inch in length, 3.2-Pound), this impact driver easily fits in tight spaces and reduces fatigue. The battery fuel gauge displays charge remaining in the battery.

AMAZON.COM


The compact design of the PCC640 20-volt max 1/4-inch hex impact driver belies its innovative lithium-ion battery power, allowing you to tackle fastening jobs in tight spaces for longer periods of time between charges (view larger). View larger. View larger. Utilizing Porter-Cable’s latest lithium-ion battery platform for power tools, the PCCK640LB 20-volt max 1/4-inch hex lithium-ion impact driver kit includes the tools and accessories necessary to power through the toughest fastening applications. With a compact and lightweight design, the PCC640 impact driver is designed to eliminate user fatigue, but it doesn’t compromise on speed and power thanks to its high-performance transmission and high-torque motor. Combined with two PCC680L lithium-ion compact batteries and a FMC690L lithium-ion charger, the PCCK640LB impact driver kit includes everything you need for a variety of projects, whether you’re assembling HVAC ducts, building a deck, or installing drywall.

LITHIUM-ION INNOVATION
Porter-Cable’s PCCK640LB 20-volt max 1/4-inch lithium-ion impact driver kit capitalizes on the latest lithium-ion battery platform, allowing for the compact PCC640 impact driver to deliver long-lasting power that gets the job done. The high- torque motor (1,450 inch-pounds) and high-performance variable-speed transmission (0-2,900 RPM/0-3,000 BPM) maximizes efficiency for fastening applications. Monitor the charge level of the included PCC680L 1.5 amp-hour lithium-ion batteries with the impact driver’s incorporated battery gauge to manage performance capacity on the job site.

COMPACT COMPETENCE
Porter-Cable has managed to pack all that lithium-ion power in a small package—measuring 6.2 inches in length and weighing only 3.2 pounds, the PCC640 20-volt max impact driver was built to fit into tight spaces inside nooks and crannies to fasten easily but powerfully. Its ergonomic design, cold-forged internal impact block, and no-slip grip reduce user fatigue and increase ease of use over long periods of time. A built-in LED light improves visibility, while rubber bumpers on both sides help to protect it from wear and tear. The 1/4-inch hex quick-change chuck and two-bit storage feature make it easy to change and store bits, and the built-in belt hook means it’s never out of arm’s reach on the job.

ABOUT PORTER-CABLE
With more than 100 years of experience producing quality and performance-driven tools, Porter-Cable is a leading manufacturer and marketer of professional-grade cordless and corded power tools, equipment, and accessories. Known for industry-changing innovation, Porter-Cable introduced the world’s first helical drive circular saw, portable band saw, and portable belt sander.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
One Porter-Cable PCCK640LB kit, including one PCC640 20-volt max 1/4-inch hex lithium-ion impact driver, two PCC680L lithium-ion compact batteries, one PCC699L lithium-ion charger, and one No. 2 Philips head screwdriving bit. 

HIGHLIGHTS
 * 20-volt maximum impact driver ideal for a variety of fastening applications
 * High-torque motor provides 1,450 inch-pounds of torque
 * High-performance transmission (0-2,900 RPM/0-3,000 BPM) for quick and efficient driving
 * Lightweight (3.2 pounds), compact, and ergonomic design for user comfort
 * 20-volt max lithium-ion batteries with 1.5 amp/hour cells for more power and longer runtime
 * Includes a No. 2 Philips head screwdriving bit for efficient fastening on the job

Porter-Cable PCCK640LB kit includes the PCC640 20-volt maximum 1/4-inch hex impact driver, above (view larger).
feature_bullets: High torque motor and high performance transmission deliver quick fastening applications
This product is manufactured in China
High performance transmission for quick fastening applications
Compact tool easily fits in tight spaces and reduces fatigue
Easy load chuck allows user to insert bit with one hand
Battery fuel gauge displays charge remaining in the battery
LED Work light provides additional light in dark work areas
